description:
AGENDA 


Welcome to the first Sitecore Usergroup event (Be-Lux). This event aims at building an eclectic Sitecore community to share experience and knowledge.

• Introduction: What, who, why? By Niels Bramsen

• Session 1 : Sitecore and Social Media
 How and why should you do it? How Sitecore can hook up with social platforms: Single sign on, profiles management, content exposure and much more. 
Case study and Q&As
Speaker: Raf Kinnaer and Ivan Lieckens

Session 2 : Sitecore modules: Can big become bigger ? 
Overview on Sitecore productivity-booster modules, both from the Marketplace as on the Sitecore Developer Network (SDN). Best picks for marketers and developers.
Discussion and Q&As with people responsible for the marketplace at Sitecore 
Speaker: Kris Verheire and Jimmie Overby

• Network and mingle time


MORE:

Contribute on Twitter: #SugBeLux
We want your opinion: Take the poll now

You can also register by mail : send an e-mail to [masked]

MOONBEAT location
name: Sitecore User Group (SUG) BELUX #1 - Social Media & noteworthy modules

description:
AGENDA 


The SUG board members would like to welcome you to the second Sitecore User Group event (BeLux). This event aims at building an eclectic Sitecore community to share experience and knowledge.

• Welcome: Shor</a>t introduction into the agenda and future SUG approach.


• Session 1 : Sitecore Symposium Highlights
 Sitecore Symposium Barcelona on September 15-17.
The Sessions, The Speakers, The Roadmap, The Vision.
We will try to capture as much information as possible and compress everything into a good first high-level presentation. Follow-up sessions on specific topics may be needed to show the opportunities and impact that certain new product features might bring.
Insight presentation and Q&A
Speaker: TBC<a href="http://www.meetup.com/Sitecore-User-Group-Belgium/members/148573212/">

• Session 2 : How-to (e-)CRM ?
What is the best practice of linking a CRM with Sitecore?
Which CRM systems are best fit for Sitecore?
What are the Pros and Cons of the various CRMs.
How mature is Sitecore in serving as a full-fledged e-CRM solution ?


Case Study and Q&A
Speaker: Johan Becue - Sitecore Technical Consultant</a>

• Network and mingle time
 Featuring food and drinks

MORE:

Contribute on Twitter: <a href="https://twitter.com/search?f=realtime&q=%23sugbelux&src=typd">#SugBeLux
We want your opinion: Take the poll now

You can also register by mail : send an e-mail to [masked]

name: Sitecore User Group (SUG) BELUX #2 - Sitecore Symposium Highlights & How-to CRM
